channel.title: Reporting on Glendon Hodges

item.title: Analytics reporting
item.description: In 2017, Calabrio acquired an analytics and data visualization software company. At the time, customers had access to a limited set of documentation published on Confluence. The space was maintained by developers and product management. As the technical writer for this project, I reviewed published and unpublished content to develop a strategy and migrate content to MadCap Flare. The functionality of the reports drove most of the demand for this software.
